net.hudup.data.bit

Class BitItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.data.bit.BitItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class BitItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    This class represents a bit item (binary item).
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected BitsetItem bitItem
      Bit item BitsetItem
      protected Pair pair
      The key of Pair is the real item id, the value is the rating value such as 1, 2, 3, 4, 5

      • sortItems

        public static void sortItems(java.util.List<BitItem> items,
                             boolean descending)
        Sorting list of BitItem (s) according to their support
        Parameters:
        items - List of BitItem (s)
        descending -
        • true: bit items are sorted in descending order.
        • false: bit items are sorted in ascending order.
